binding:binding.name: Shelly Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding supports the Shelly series of devices.
binding:binding.author: Markus Michels

parameter.name: defaultUserId
parameter.label: Default User
parameter.description: Default userId to access protected Shelly devices.

parameter.name: defaultPassword
parameter.label: Default Password
parameter.description: Default password to access protected Shelly devices.

parameter.name: autoCoIoT
parameter.label: Auto-enable CoIoT
parameter.description: True: Enable CoIoT events by default when firmware 1.6+ is detected
